text.0: Over the past few days, our paper in Nature Communications has drawn much attention from journalists, colleagues, and on social media. Let me clarify two common misunderstandings that we often encounter:
text.1:
For further nuance about the paper and how its representation in the media is prone to misunderstanding about our study's main conclusions, see this report by the fact checkers of @ClimateFdbk 

https://t.co/GMwg50z8lJ
